reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Amazing professor! She explains complex concepts in a very simple way and is always available for questions.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: His lectures are informative but can be a bit dry. Be prepared to read a lot.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and patient. Sometimes goes too fast, but she is willing to help after class.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult to follow his lectures, and his exams are extremely tough. Not the best for beginners.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: One of the best professors I’ve ever had! She makes the subject fascinating and engages everyone in class.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but his grading is inconsistent. Be sure to participate in discussions.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Her classes are insightful, and she genuinely cares about her students. Sometimes her assignments are unclear.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Terrible professor. He is unorganized and unhelpful. Avoid if you can.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: She brings the literature to life! Her passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Difficult to understand, and his exams are much harder than what is taught in class.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and encourages critical thinking. However, her lectures can be dense.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: He has a lot of knowledge but tends to go off-topic. Class discussions are interesting though.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Her fieldwork stories make the class incredibly engaging.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: His lectures are boring, and he doesn’t explain things well. Labs are confusing.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and cares about student success, but her exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Incredible professor. His cases and examples are very relevant and engaging.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, but her lectures can be long and repetitive.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: His lectures are clear, and he is approachable. However, his tests are tough.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her enthusiasm for art is contagious. Every lecture is a joy to attend.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: His lectures are practical but can be monotonous. Group projects are key to doing well.
